name: EOG Simplest Share Buttons
author: El Ojo Grafico

sections.description:
This plugins allows us to insert share buttons in the single post view, with no loading pain.

At this moment, it works with Facebook, Google+, Twitter and Whatsapp (this last only when displaying on mobile devices).

It has just a few options to configure it, and works fine with no special requirements.

If you like it, please rate it and any review, comment, question or petition will be welcomed.
sections.installation:
You can either install the plugin manually or through the wordpress plugin repository.

Manually

Just download and unzip the file containing the plugin and upload the folder and every content to your installed wordpress plugins folder (e.g. http://yourdomain.com/wp-content/plugins).

Go to Admin->Plugins and activate the plugin. A new menu option named \’EOG Simplest Share Buttons\’ will appear at your admin panel. Use this options to configurate the plugin.

Through the WordPress.org plugin repository

In your admin panel, go to Plugins->Add new, and search \’EOG Simplest Share Buttons\’. Click on \’Install Now\’ and activate the plugin. A new menu option named \’EOG Simplest Share Buttons\’ will appear at your admin panel. Use this options to configurate the plugin.
